duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute the partnership strategy and goals with Salesforce and other key partnerships.
Serve as the primary point of contact from Snowflake on these relationships across internal and external touchpoints.
Coordinate the launch of integrations or joint solutions with Salesforce and other partners.
Collaborate with Marketing and Sales teams to build joint go-to-market plans, marketing engines, and sales strategies materials.
Develop joint sales plays that effectively position Salesforce and other partners in conjunction with the core benefits of Snowflake.
Drive sales enablement efforts around joint solutions across the global Snowflake sales organization.
Engage directly with strategic customers, partners, and internal stakeholders.
Collaborate with Salesforce to build a comprehensive annual joint business plan.
Coordinate joint presence at key events and related industry events.
Work collaboratively with internal teams in support of customer/partner success.
Solve complex problems and deliver growth metrics independently.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 7 years of relevant sales, business development, or alliances experience.
MBA or advanced degree is a plus.
